data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 1, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Tondela in Tondela.
Nuno Almeida signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Braga's area.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Braga in the half of Tondela.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 7, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 7, Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Braga's Iuri Medeiros is on target but unsuccessful.
Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 10, Braga to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Braga are coming forward and Iuri Medeiros gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tondela have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Nuno Almeida awards Braga a goal kick.
Nuno Almeida signals a Tondela throw-in in Braga's half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 17, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Braga just outside Tondela's area.
Braga's Andre Castro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 19, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
Free kick Braga.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 20, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Braga.
Corner awarded to Tondela.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Braga.
Goal! Bruno Viana gives Braga a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Paulinho.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in Braga.
Nuno Almeida signals a Braga throw-in in Tondela's half.
In the minute 26, Goal! Wenderson Galeno extends Braga's lead to 0-2.
Nuno Almeida waits before resuming play because Wenderson Galeno for Braga is still down.
Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Wenderson Galeno is back on the pitch.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Braga take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Ricardo Horta.
In the minute 29, Wenderson Galeno with an assist there.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Braga.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Can Tondela capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Braga's half?
In the minute 35, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Tomislav Strkalj of Tondela gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
In the minute 36, Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 39, Braga's Paulinho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Throw-in Tondela.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Tondela's Bebeto breaks free at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braga pushes forward through Paulinho, whose finish on goal is saved.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
In the minute 43, Braga move into a 0-4 lead through a Wenderson Galeno header.
Iuri Medeiros instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Braga.
In the minute 45, Nuno Almeida awards the away team a throw-in.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Tondela.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Filipe Ferreira with Mohamed Naoufel Khacef.
Enzo Martinez is replacing Joao Pedro for the home team.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Braga.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 50, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Tondela.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Braga.
Nuno Almeida awards Tondela a goal kick.
Mohamed Naoufel Khacef (Tondela) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Tondela have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Tondela push forward at Estadio Joao Cardoso and Enzo Martinez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Braga defence.
In the minute 55, Nuno Almeida awards the home team a throw-in.
Braga are pushing forward but Paulinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 57, Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In Tondela Tondela attack through Tomislav Strkalj. The finish is off target, however.
Braga have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Braga's Paulinho has run offside.
Ricardo Alves for Tondela gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Braga goal kick.
In the minute 59, Braga to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
In the minute 60, Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Tondela.
Bebeto for Tondela has been booked by Nuno Almeida and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 61, Wenderson Galeno is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Wenderson Galeno returns to the field for Braga after picking up a slight injury.
Tondela's Mohamed Naoufel Khacef misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In Tondela Braga's Paulinho is caught offside.
Andre Castro for Braga gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Nuno Almeida awards Tondela a goal kick.
Throw-in Braga.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rafael Barbosa is replacing Tomislav Strkalj for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Souleymane Anne is on a sub for Bebeto for Tondela.
In the minute 67, Tondela drives forward and Rafael Barbosa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nuno Almeida signals a Braga throw-in in Tondela's half.
Tondela's Mohamed Naoufel Khacef gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tondela are coming forward and Souleymane Anne gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tondela.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Tondela.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Iuri Medeiros with Andre Horta. This is the first substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
Braga have a goal kick.
Braga to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Throw-in Braga.
In the minute 77, Free kick Tondela.
Carlos Carvalhal is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Francisco Moura replacing Wenderson Galeno.
Carlos Carvalhal (Braga) is making a third substitution, with Joao Novais replacing Andre Castro.
In the minute 78, Francisco Moura gets his shot on target but fails to score for Braga.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 80, Braga have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Braga have an attacking throw-in.
Nuno Almeida signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Tondela have a goal kick.
Andre Horta of Braga gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Corner awarded to Braga.
David Carmo (Braga) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 87, Braga have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Nuno Almeida.
Braga attack but David Carmo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Abel Ruiz is replacing Ricardo Horta for Braga at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Braga make their fifth substitution with Rodrigo Gomes replacing Fransergio.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Braga.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Tondela have been given a penalty at Estadio Joao Cardoso...
Nuno Almeida awards Tondela a penalty but Salvador Agra misses from 12 yards.
Salvador Agra of Tondela smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's 0-4 as the referee blows for full-time.
